description: This file declares the LocalStore class, which implements the ILocalStore interface for managing a local SQLite database. It includes methods for opening the database, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entry counts, fetching entries, removing entries, and adding entries. The class members include a database connection pointer and a filepath string.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: Implements local storage operations interfacing with an SQLite database, including opening the database, creating tables, limiting entries, fetching and removing entries, and adding entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the database located at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Returns the count of entries within a range in a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting from a position.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries within a specified range from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a table.

methods.name: buildGetEventsQuery
methods.description: Constructs an SQL query string for retrieving events.
